Subject: Limiting crawls (mostly) to HTML

X-Yahoo-Profile: tree02139

I've come up with a recipe for limiting crawls to HTML documents. It
involves a combination of an regular expression based exclude filter
and a minor change to the ARCWriter to only store text/html content in
the ARC.

Details and rationalization can be found at

          http://www.dreamersrealm.net/tree/blog/2004/08/19/

Share and enjoy.

    -tree
